title: Calories in Cinnamon
meta_description: Discover calories in cinnamon per teaspoon, including carbs, fiber, protein, and other nutrients for this spice in your recipes.
assumptions: Ground cinnamon, per level teaspoon (approx. 2.6 g), unsweetened, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (e.g., Ceylon vs. Cassia), brand, grind, and measurement; values are approximate. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of ground cinnamon contains about 6 calories and 1.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp sugar to the cinnamon

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon of cinnamon?
faqs.a: About 6 kcal per teaspoon of ground cinnamon.

faqs.q: Does cinnamon have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, 2.1 g carbs and 1.4 g fiber per teaspoon, mostly from fiber.

faqs.q: Is cinnamon low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0 g fat and 0.1 g protein per teaspoon.
Approximately 247 kcal per 100 g of ground cinnamon.
Mainly the amount used; added sugars or oils in recipes increase totals.
